evidence.claim: Ashling utilizes AWS for hosting services and scalable cloud infrastructure.
The company's solutions support FHIR standards for health data interchange.
Ashling integrates with EHR systems using HL7 standards and protocols.
The documentation mentions support for X12 EDI transaction sets for healthcare.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence found for X12 or clearinghouse use cases on their site.
